analysis.description: weiAmount in Crowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#244) is a local variable never initialiazed
tokens in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#229) is a local variable never initialiazed

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#225-242) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#239-240)

Crowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#242-256) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#251-252)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#225-242):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#239-240)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holders (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#240-241)
	- isHolder (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#240-241)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#242-256):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#251-252)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holders (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#252-253)
	- isHolder (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#252-253)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#225-242) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= time0 && block.timestamp < time2 (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#232-235)
	- block.timestamp >= time3 && block.timestamp < time7 (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#234-235)

Crowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#242-256) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= time3 && block.timestamp < time7 (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#247-250)
	- block.timestamp >= time0 && block.timestamp < time2 (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#245-250)

Crowdsale.hasEnded (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#268-275) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < time0 || (block.timestamp > time2 && block.timestamp < time3) || block.timestamp > time7 (/unique_chucks/5/0xbf5eed8d51b20834c9d887b22c229237922055d7.sol#269-273)

elements.expression: block.timestamp < time0 || (block.timestamp > time2 && block.timestamp < time3) || block.timestamp > time7
